name: PailBall
description:
In PailBall, you are given a series of levels, each with a set of objects that you can use to guide a ball towards a pail. Your goal is to use your creativity and problem-solving skills to find the right combination of objects and arrangements that will successfully guide the ball into the pail.

As you progress through the game, the levels will become more challenging, requiring you to think carefully about how to use the properties of different objects and make the most of the available space.

Whether you're a seasoned puzzle game player or just looking for a fun, casual challenge, PailBall is sure to keep you entertained.
